fullText:
Wellspring of Life

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, warden, Font of Life class feature
Benefit: When you succeed on a saving throw granted by your Font of Life, each ally adjacent to you gains a +1 bonus to saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 146.
name: Wellspring of Life
prerequisite: 11th level, warden, Font of Life class feature
benefit: When you succeed on a saving throw granted by your Font of Life, each ally adjacent to you gains a +1 bonus to saving throws until the end of your next turn.
